Entry.JapaneseText: ハーフが住んでいたという場所を見つけるのが 当面の目標だな。
Entry.EnglishText: Our next order of business is to look for the village where Halfs are said to live.

Entry.JapaneseText: 東大陸の北方って言うと、 キョグエンやノルゼンかな。
Entry.EnglishText: Well if it's in the north of the eastern continent, we should check out Kyogen or Nolzen.
